title: Property Management System - Cloudbeds
desc: BestPOS now offers Cloudbeds integration with Oracle Micros POS, giving hotels, hostels, and resorts a unified platform for reservations, guest folios, payments, and reporting.

features.title: Key Benefits for Hotels
features.description: Cloudbeds + POS integration built to streamline every aspect of hotel operations.
details: Auto-post guest charges: restaurant, spa, and minibar charges instantly appear in Cloudbeds guest folios.
Faster check-outs: eliminate manual entry, reduce errors, and shorten wait times.
Centralized reporting: unify POS and PMS data for complete revenue visibility.
Increase direct bookings: Cloudbeds booking engine + integrated payments lower OTA commissions.
Scalable solution: ideal for boutique hotels, hostels, resorts, and serviced apartments.

features.title: How It Works
features.description: Integration made simple in three steps:
details: Connect Cloudbeds with your POS system through BestPOS integration.
Map POS menu items to the correct Cloudbeds revenue categories.
Sync & reconcile automatically: guest charges, payments, and tips post into the right folios and reports.

features.title: Core Features
features.description: All-in-one hospitality management, from front desk to F&B.
details: Two-way folio posting: Real-time sync from POS terminals to Cloudbeds folios.
Secure payment processing: EMV, contactless, tokenized transactions.
Multi-outlet support: Manage charges from dining, bar, spa, and activity centers.
Centralized reporting: Combine occupancy, F&B sales, and payments in one dashboard.
Revenue optimization: Leverage Cloudbeds’ pricing intelligence tools with POS data.
Integration flexibility: Cloudbeds officially supports Oracle Micros POS, making it the best choice for hotels looking for a proven, fully compatible integration.

features.title: Who It’s For
features.description: Simplify business management with fully automated capabilities to eliminate hassles.
details: Boutique Hotels: Connect dining outlets with front-desk folios.
Resorts: Manage multiple restaurants, bars, and spas seamlessly.
Hostels: Simplify guest folios and reporting across shared spaces.
Serviced Apartments: Streamline long-stay billing and services.
